description: Pick your 'Well XI for cup clash
title: Pick your 'Well XI for cup clash
title_page: Pick your 'Well XI for cup clash - BBC Sport
maintext:
Viaplay Cup progress is the target for Motherwell on Saturday when they host East Fife.
A point will be enough for the Steelmen to top the group, but they'll be determined to sign off in style with a convincing win.
